#Cardano has two main wallets for staking. Daedalus is a desktop wallet and it needs to download all blocks so there is a syncing when you start it.   Yoroi is browser extension and there is no syncing.   You can delegate $ADA to a pool from both of them.  #blockchain $btc $eth  https://t.co/7RmCwzA3p4
